title: Effect of media on public opinion

content.question: The media’s effect on public opinion can best be described as

choices.label: influencing older citizens’ opinions of incumbents
affecting the public’s views on domestic policy only
influencing which issues the public sees as important
changing well-educated people’s views on foreign policy
influencing the public’s views on controversial issues only

content.answer: influencing which issues the public sees as important
